items.title: Former Minnesota House Speaker Hortman to lie in state as suspect heads to court
items.description: Former Minnesota House Speaker Melissa Hortman will lie in state at the Minnesota Capitol rotunda

items.title: Japan executes man convicted of murder after killing and dismembering nine people
items.description: Japan has executed a man who was convicted of murder after killing and dismembering nine people

items.title: Key inflation gauge rose last month while Americans cut back on spending
items.description: A key inflation gauge moved higher in May in the latest sign that prices remain stubbornly elevated while Americans cut back on their spending

items.title: Pardon applications are being carefully crafted with one man in mind: Donald Trump
items.description: President Donald Trump's unconventional approach to clemency has spread hope among federal prisoners and formerly incarcerated people around the Unite...

items.title: UN peacekeeping chief warns that conflict in Sudan is spilling into Central African Republic
items.description: The United Nations peacekeeping chief has warned that the conflict in Sudan is spilling across its southwest border into Central African Republic
